Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Five elements of a necklace
Description: Set of five similar elements of a necklace comprised of mother of pearl shells. Two of these shells are complete: they have the overall shape of a flattened pear with a suspension hole at the top. The three other elements are only fragmentary: all are broken at the tip, near the opening.
